rules.natural: If network TV airs the public health show, then public alcohol consumption does not increase liver disease cases
Network TV airs the public health show or online platforms stream the public health show
If online platforms stream the public health show, then public alcohol consumption does not increase liver disease cases
The health agency monitors alcohol consumption trends or the health agency reviews alcohol consumption data

If the health agency reviews alcohol consumption data, then either the health agency launches an alternative entertainment program or, given that the health agency enforces advertising restrictions, reduced alcohol consumption lowers public health risk

rules.prover9_expression: (proposes(health_agency, new_legislation) | (-(monitors(health_agency, alcohol_consumption_trends) -> (launches(health_agency, alternative_entertainment_program) | (enforces(health_agency, advertising_restrictions) -> reduces(alcohol_consumption, public_health_risk)))) -> issues(health_agency, public_health_warning)))
rules.natural: The health agency proposes new legislation or, should the monitoring of alcohol consumption trends by the health agency not lead to either the launching of an alternative entertainment program by the health agency or the enforcement of advertising restrictions by the health agency resulting in reduced alcohol consumption lowering public health risk, then the health agency issues a public health warning
If Congress rejects the new legislation, then the health agency does not propose new legislation
If the public health department maintains current funding, then the public health department has funding for an awareness campaign
If the public health department continues existing programs, then the public health department maintains current funding
The health agency implements emergency measures or hospital admissions for alcohol-related cases do not rise
If the government declares a public health emergency, then the health agency does not implement emergency measures
The government declares a public health emergency or the government activates emergency powers
If the government activates emergency powers, then the health agency does not implement emergency measures
Congress passes the alcohol tax bill or the president approves the alcohol tax bill
If the president approves the alcohol tax bill, then reduced alcohol consumption lowers public health risk
If Congress introduces the alcohol tax bill, then should Congress pass the alcohol tax bill, reduced alcohol consumption lowers public health risk
Congress introduces the alcohol tax bill or the president supports the alcohol tax bill
If the state government implements an alcohol ban, then public alcohol consumption increases liver disease cases
The state government implements an alcohol ban or reduced alcohol consumption lowers public health risk
If public alcohol consumption increases liver disease cases, then hospital admissions for alcohol-related cases rise

rules.prover9_expression: (-(monitors(health_agency, alcohol_consumption_trends) -> (launches(health_agency, alternative_entertainment_program) | (enforces(health_agency, advertising_restrictions) -> reduces(alcohol_consumption, public_health_risk)))) -> -issues(health_agency, public_health_warning))
rules.natural: Under the condition that the monitoring of alcohol consumption trends by the health agency does not lead to either the launching of an alternative entertainment program by the health agency or the enforcement of advertising restrictions by the health agency resulting in reduced alcohol consumption lowering public health risk, then the health agency does not issue a public health warning

rules.prover9_expression: (-(supports(president, alcohol_tax_bill) -> (passes(congress, alcohol_tax_bill) -> reduces(alcohol_consumption, public_health_risk))) -> receives_funding(alcohol_industry, tax_credits))
